content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/tiangolo/fastapi.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
FROM python:3.9

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository content into the container
COPY . /app/

# Create and activate the virtual environment, install dependencies
RUN python -m venv venv && \
    . venv/bin/activate && \
    pip install --upgrade pip && \
    pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run the test suite to ensure everything is set up correctly
RUN . venv/bin/activate && bash scripts/test-cov-html.sh
